author: scottclarke1
body:
When running the Connect-ExoPSSession cmdlet to connect to Exchange Online with MFA enabled, the following error is returned;

Could not load type 'System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256Cng' from assembly 'System.Core, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=<redacted>'.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@scottclarke1 The repo is for PowerShell dev only. Please use other channels to report the issue.

I guess EXO is not PowerShell Core compatible.

title: Connect-ExoPSSession Error
